message: For those that couldn't make it, I've posted notes of his talk on Storm: http://mschade.me/notes-storm-twitters-scalable-realtime-comput

Trying to follow the install directions on the wiki (on OS X Lion) I'm getting stuck trying to install jzmq.  After running autogen.sh I run the configure script and I get:  ./configure: line 15148: syntax error near unexpected token `newline'
./configure: line 15148: `    PKG_CHECK_MODULES('
Also leave a few my personal notes here: http://www.arjones.net/post/10405363194/strangeloop-storm-twitters-scalable-realtime

How to install ZeroMQ/JZMQ in MacOSX: 
http://blog.pmorelli.com/getting-zeromq-and-jzmq-running-on-mac-os-x
